page_content: The page discusses the measures and services provided by the Canton of Aargau for COVID-19 affected individuals.
The page provides an overview of the Informatik Aargau department, responsible for the strategy and operation of central IT services in the Canton of Aargau.
The page discusses an interdisciplinary project for students that focuses on the concept of rules in games and performances.
The page focuses on traffic regulations and safety measures enforced by the Kantonspolizei Aargau.
The page announces an online Coffee Lecture about ChatGPT and other artificial intelligences, focusing on their functionalities and applications in education.
The page profiles Anna Flurina KÃ¤lin, who specializes in digital culture dissemination and software development, particularly in AR and VR.
The page discusses the AGOBIS system and Geres Message Viewer (GMV) software, used for property and object information management in the Canton of Aargau.
